import axios from 'axios'; import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { localStorageGet, localStorageSet } from '../../../../StorageGS'; import './index.scss' export default class index extends Component { state = { transformLeft: '37px' } componentDidMount() { let keyword if(this.props.location.state.keyword === '') { keyword = localStorageGet("keyword", this.props.location.state.keyword) }else { keyword = this.props.location.state.keyword } axios.get('http://localhost:3001/api/searchresults', { params: { keyword } }) .then( function(response) { console.log(response) }) .catch( function(err) { console.log(err) }) } changeActive = () => { console.log("鼠标移入") } render() { const { transformLeft } = this.state return (
